bibl.title: A Ghost palaestra at Antinoopolis. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: A palaestra is shown on: [M. MANFREDI e A. PERICOLI], Carta di Antinoupolis, 1:4000 (Firenze, 1998). It is suggested that the structure is a nineteenth-century salpetre factory.
bibl.seg: BAILEY Donald M., A Ghost palaestra at Antinoopolis. Avec résumé en anglais.
A palaestra is shown on: [M. MANFREDI e A. PERICOLI], Carta di Antinoupolis, 1:4000 (Firenze, 1998). It is suggested that the structure is a nineteenth-century salpetre factory.
